#summary Defining particle systems in catalog files

= Introduction =

Example of a !ParticleSystem geometry definition:

{{{
"geometry" :
{
    "type" : "ParticleSystem",
    "emitters" :
    [
      {
        "texture" : "gaussian.jpg",
        "generator" :
        {
          "type" : "Point",
          "velocity" : [ 0, 0, 0.1 ]
        },
        "velocityVariation" : 2.5,
        "spawnRate" : 100,
        "lifetime" : 10.0,
        "startSize" : 0.0,
        "endSize" : 5.0,
        "colors" : [ "#10eeff", 0.6, "blue", 0.0 ],
        "endTime" : 3451545.0
      }
   ]
}
}}}
